hero.title: Maximize Sporting Potential with <1>Artificial Intelligence</1>
hero.subtitle: Leading platform for coaches, clubs, and athletes looking to optimize performance and sports strategy through advanced AI.

header.tutorials_desc: Learn to use ProSportAi step by step.

footer.tagline: Transforming sports training with artificial intelligence. We empower coaches, clubs, and athletes to achieve their maximum performance internationally.
footer.newsletter_info: Get the latest news and tips from ProSportAi.

tutorial.main_subtitle: Discover how to navigate and use all the powerful tools ProSportAi has to offer. Let's get started!

navigation.title: Main Navigation
navigation.description: Understand how to move around the platform.

header.title: Header
header.text: At the top, you'll find the logo, links to key sections (Coaches, Clubs, Athletes, AI Assistant), Resources, and the user/language menu.

language.title: Language Switcher
language.text: Select your preferred language using the globe icon in the header.

user_menu.title: User Menu
user_menu.text: If logged in, access your dashboard, profile, or log out here. If not, you'll see options to Log In or Sign Up.

footer.title: Footer
footer.text: Contains useful links to solutions, resources, company information, legal terms, and social media.

overview.title: Overview
overview.text: View a summary of your activity, training plan, key stats, and important notifications.

training.title: Training
training.text: Access your assigned training plans or explore available templates. Click to see details.

profile.title: Profile
profile.text: Update your personal information, such as name and email.

settings.title: Settings
settings.text: Configure security options (like 2FA) and manage integrations (coming soon).

templates.title: Template Management (Coaches/Admins)
templates.description: Create and manage smart training templates.

access.title: Access
access.text: Coaches and admins can access 'Training Templates' from the user menu in the header.

create.title: Create Templates
create.text: Use the form to define name, description, objective, level, duration, and detailed structure by days and exercises.

view_edit.title: View & Edit
view_edit.text: Click on a template to see its details. Use icons to edit or download the template in JSON format.

delete.title: Delete
delete.text: Remove templates you no longer need using the trash icon.

auth.title: Access & Registration
auth.description: How to join and access ProSportAi.

register.title: Sign Up
register.text: Create your account by selecting your role (Athlete, Coach, Club) and completing the form.

login.title: Log In
login.text: Access with your email and password. If 2FA is enabled, you'll be prompted for the code.

logout.title: Log Out
logout.text: Securely disconnect from the user menu.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.text: Find quick answers to common questions in our FAQ section in the footer.

video.title: Video Tutorials
video.text: Explore our videos for detailed visual guides on specific features.

contact.title: Direct Contact
contact.text: If you need personalized assistance, don't hesitate to contact our support team via the link in the footer.

tutorial.ready_to_start: Ready to take your training to the next level?

blog.main_subtitle: Discover the latest news, analysis, and tips on AI in sports, performance, and team management.
blog.no_articles_criteria: No articles match your search or filter criteria. Try different terms.
blog.no_articles_yet: We haven't published any articles yet. Check back soon!

article1.title: How AI is Revolutionizing Modern Sports Training
article1.summary: Artificial intelligence is no longer science fiction. Discover how advanced algorithms are personalizing routines, preventing injuries, and optimizing the performance of elite and amateur athletes.

article2.title: Personalized Nutrition for Athletes: The Key Role of AI
article2.summary: Every athlete is unique, and their nutrition should be too. We explore how AI analyzes biometric data to create meal plans that maximize energy and recovery.

article3.title: Injury Prevention: The Smart Ally Every Athlete Needs
article3.summary: Injuries are the great enemy of progress. AI, through movement analysis and historical data, is becoming a fundamental tool to identify risks and act before they occur.

article4.title: Efficient Team Management in the Digital Age: Tools and Strategies
article4.summary: Coordinating a sports team goes beyond on-field tactics. Discover how digital platforms and AI facilitate communication, planning, and tracking team progress.

chat_assistant.title: ProSportAi AI Assistant
chat_assistant.error_api_key_missing_desc: OpenAI API key is not configured. Please add it to your environment variables (VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY).
chat_assistant.error_api_key_missing: OpenAI API key is not configured. The assistant will not function until it is set up.
chat_assistant.api_key_warning_short: Limited functionality: API Key not set.
chat_assistant.error_api_call_desc: Could not get response from assistant. Please try again. Detail:
chat_assistant.error_api_response_placeholder: I'm sorry, I couldn't process your request at this moment. Please try again.
chat_assistant.initial_system_message_prosportai: You are ProSportAi Assistant, an expert in sports performance optimization, data analysis, and training strategies. Help the user with their queries related to sports, using the ProSportAi platform, and how AI can improve their performance or team management. Be concise, friendly, and professional.

chat_assistant_page.main_subtitle: Ask questions, get advice on training, nutrition, strategies, or how to use ProSportAi. I'm here to help you reach your goals!
chat_assistant_page.disclaimer: This AI assistant provides information and suggestions. It does not replace professional advice from coaches, doctors, or specialists. Responses are AI-generated and may require validation.

privacy_policy.main_subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to ProSportAi. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your personal data in a transparent and secure manner. This Privacy Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your information through our services.

data_collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
data_collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account (name, email, role), information about your use of our services (training data, interactions), and technical information (IP address, browser type, cookie data).

data_use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
data_use.content: We use your information to: Provide, maintain, and improve our services. Personalize your experience. Communicate with you about your account or our services. Analyze service usage to develop new features. Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights.

data_sharing.title: 4. How We Share Your Information
data_sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with: Service providers who help us operate (cloud storage, analytics). Legal authorities if required by law or to protect our rights. In the event of a business transaction like a merger or acquisition (with due protections).

data_security.title: 5. Security of Your Data
data_security.content: We implement reasonable technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no system is 100% secure.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze site usage, and for marketing purposes. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings. See our Cookie Policy for more details.

user_rights.title: 7. Your Rights
user_rights.content: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have rights over your personal data, such as the right to access, correct, delete, restrict processing, or request data portability. To exercise these rights, please contact us.

childrens_privacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrens_privacy.content: Our services are not directed to children under 13 (or the applicable minimum age in your jurisdiction). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without parental consent.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the 'Last updated' date.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at: info@prosportai.com or through our contact page.
